trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display when the activity it is associated with is set to read only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 提供的圖像<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>以顯示其相關聯的活動設定為讀取只能在設計階段時。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ReadOnlyActivityGlyph"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ReadOnlyActivityGlyph"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the glyph is associated.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示圖像是否顯示在活動設計工具介面上否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
designer contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: designer包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 執行任何轉譯活動設計工具介面上的圖像時所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>可執行填滿與繪製工作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示圖像顯示在設計介面。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> to use to access ambient property settings.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>要從其中取得使用者動作的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得活動設計工具介面上的圖像的優先權設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ShadowGlyph.Priority%2A> always returns the integer value associated with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority?displayProperty=fullName>.
An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ReadOnlyActivityGlyph"></xref> on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，表示的優先順序設定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ReadOnlyActivityGlyph"></xref>活動設計工具介面上。
